roleset.name: remove a layer (as of skin)

role.descr: patient, source, thing the layer is removed from

roleset.note: Added by Julia based on BOLT. No VNcls.

example.name: all args
example.text: I just exfoliated a layer of skin from my fingertips by using Barkeeper's Friend and a brass-bristled brush on my latest creations.
example.arg: by using Barkeeper's Friend and a brass-bristled brush on my latest creations
